attributes.title: My god no

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded this ungodly app my phone nearly exploded. the fascism was far too much for my poor iphone 6s to handle. not to mention, the first thing i saw when i opened the app was trump’s tiny limp penis. i am scarred.

attributes.title: could it be any worse
attributes.review: wow. i didn't know a terrible president could have an even worse app. if i could i would most definitely give this a lower rating
